Title: The Phantom
Plot: Roger seeks to expand his affair with Megan's mother. Pete has a "last" encounter with Beth with lasting repercussions. Megan struggles to find acting work and asks for Don's help getting an audition. Peggy still seeks Don's approval.
GuestStars: Julia Ormond, Embeth Davidtz, Alexis Bledel, Jay Paulson, Teyonah Parris, Ben Feldman, Kevin Rahm, Lou Richards, Jeff Clarke, Jon Manfrellotti, Jay Seals, Emily Foxler, James Martin Kelly, Sadie Alexandru, Geoffrey
